monogr.title: A most sweete and assured comfort for all those that are afflicted in consciscience [sic], or troubled in minde. Written by that godly & zealous preacher, M. Richard Greenham. With two comfortable letters to his especiall friends that way greeued
monogr.author: Greenham, Richard

div.head: TO THE RIGHT Worshipfull Sir DRVE DRVRIE, Knight: W. I. wisneth continuall peace of conscience.
div.p:
RIGHT Worshipfull, your zeale to Religion, and loue of Learning; haue made mee bold to present you with this fatherles Orphane; which I hope the rather you will patronage, becaus it is the fruite of a godly Parent (once with
your Worship familiar) who liuing, taught the Word sincerely; and being dead, hath lest some monument of his workes, necessary to instruct and edifie. This first is offred to the worlds view, containing all excellent comfort for an afflicted Conscience.

If you voutchsafe to accept it, I haue my desire, that boldly made choyce of you for your especiall desert. The God of mercie and Father of our Lorde Iesus lengthen your dayes, and make your end blessed.

closer.signed: Your Worships in all dutie. VV. I.
